dict.acceptation: 天空；气氛；空运；（简单易记的）曲调；

sent.orig: Switzerland adopted JUN-AIR ultra-quiet air compressor to provide fresh air and quiet.
sent.trans: 采用瑞士JUN-AIR超静空气压缩机，提供清新与安静的气流。

sent.orig: Air-tite Coin holders seal your coins and keeps them from being damaged.
sent.trans: Air-泰特钱币印章持有人的保护你的硬币，保持他们免受损坏。

sent.orig: All gone, I currently have zero AIR apps installed.
sent.trans: 所有的都卸载了，我现在连一个AIR应用都没有了。

sent.orig: Additionally there are ground-to-air, ground-to-ground, air-to-ground and air-to-air missiles, etc.
sent.trans: 另外，还有地对空导弹、地对地导弹、空对地导弹、空对空导弹等。

sent.orig: Evaluation of air-to-air tactics(AAT) is a nuclear question of simulation experiment on air-to-air fight(AAF).
sent.trans: 空战战法的评估是空战仿真实验的核心理论问题。
